title: Profile: Canada
creator_credit: Jim Turpie, Crawley Films and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film offers a magnificent panorama of Canada from coast to coast. The land, the people, the industries, the pleasures - in fact the entire life of the nation is beautifully filmed in this colorful composite survey.
